question: My mother sister’s little daughter is my razai sister (feeded milk of my mother in childhood) Can I marry with my mother sister’s elder daughter?
answer:
QUESTION

My mother sister’s little daughter is my razai sister (feeded milk of my mother in childhood) Can I marry with my mother sister’s elder daughter?


ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Considering the fact that the elder sister did not drink milk from your mother, it will be permissible for you to marry her. 

 

وكذا يجوز للرجل أن يتزوج أخت أخته من الرضاع
(بدائع الصناشع، 3/400، ديوبند)

And Allah knows best

Wassalamu Alaikum

Ml. Sajid bin Shabbir,
Student Darul Iftaa
